mapper.select: select straightlinkmanage_id, straightlink_file_name, straightlink_file_uuid_name, straightlink_file_type, straightlink_file_extension_name, straightlink_file_size, straightlink_file_url_key, straightlink_file_url, straightlink_file_down_num, status, use_status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from tool_straightlinkmanage where straightlinkmanage_id = #{straightlinkmanageId}
mapper.insert: insert into tool_straightlinkmanage ( straightlink_file_name, straightlink_file_uuid_name, straightlink_file_type, straightlink_file_extension_name, straightlink_file_size, straightlink_file_url_key, straightlink_file_url, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark )values( #{straightlinkFileName}, #{straightlinkFileUuidName}, #{straightlinkFileType}, #{straightlinkFileExtensionName}, #{straightlinkFileSize}, #{straightlinkFileUrlKey}, #{straightlinkFileUrl}, #{status}, #{createBy}, sysdate(), #{updateBy}, sysdate(), #{remark} )
mapper.delete:
delete from tool_straightlinkmanage where straightlinkmanage_id in
#{straightlinkmanageId}
